description: GitHub App installation manifest for Insightpulseai org. GitHub does not support batch API installation — each app must be installed via its install URL. This manifest provides quick-access URLs and tracks install status.

recommended_additions.name: Supabase
recommended_additions.reason: Active in personal account (~3 weeks ago), used for task bus and n8n workflows

recommended_additions.name: DigitalOcean
recommended_additions.reason: Active in personal account (~2 months ago), hosts production infrastructure

recommended_additions.name: Renovate
recommended_additions.reason: Automated dependency updates across org repos

recommended_additions.name: Sentry
recommended_additions.reason: Error monitoring integration with commit tracking

recommended_additions.name: Mermaid Chart
recommended_additions.reason: Diagram rendering in PRs and issues — already authorized personally

recommended_additions.name: draw.io App
recommended_additions.reason: Architecture diagram editing in-repo — already authorized personally

not_recommended_for_org.name: Netlify
not_recommended_for_org.reason: Vercel is the canonical frontend host

not_recommended_for_org.name: Railway App
not_recommended_for_org.reason: DigitalOcean is the canonical infra host

not_recommended_for_org.name: Render
not_recommended_for_org.reason: DigitalOcean is the canonical infra host

not_recommended_for_org.name: Neon Postgres
not_recommended_for_org.reason: DO managed PostgreSQL is the canonical DB host

not_recommended_for_org.name: Linear
not_recommended_for_org.reason: Azure Boards/GitHub Projects for project management

not_recommended_for_org.name: monday.com + GitHub
not_recommended_for_org.reason: Azure Boards/GitHub Projects for project management

not_recommended_for_org.name: Percy
not_recommended_for_org.reason: No visual testing in current workflow

not_recommended_for_org.name: docker
not_recommended_for_org.reason: Docker Hub integration not needed at org level

not_recommended_for_org.name: Google AI Studio
not_recommended_for_org.reason: Personal AI tool, Claude is canonical AI agent

not_recommended_for_org.name: Prisma
not_recommended_for_org.reason: Not part of current ORM stack
